titles.title: Recognizing the 100th Anniversary of the establishment of the Department of Labor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 3/6/2013--Introduced. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the establishment of the Department of Labor. Congratulates and commends all those who served as employees of the Department to improve the lives of working people.
